studioContent:
Angry Wisp is an independent studio from France, created from a passion for games and digital entertainment.

We are a strike team ready to tackle challenges in order to provide the best experience possible.

We believe in delivering games that we would enjoy playing.

privacyContent.welcome: Welcome to Angry Wisp! This Privacy Policy explains our approach to data collection and privacy. Our website does not collect any personal data. The following policy only applies to our games available on Steam.

infoCollect.title: Information Collection
infoCollect.intro: Our website does not collect any personal data. Regarding our games:

gameplay.title: Game Data Only
gameplay.content: We only collect anonymous gameplay data that cannot be linked to any individual. This includes: game progression, completion rates, and technical performance metrics. This information helps us improve game balance and fix technical issues.

analytics.title: Game Analytics
analytics.content: Our games use Unity Analytics and Steam Analytics for game performance monitoring. These services may collect:
items: Technical information about game performance and errors
analytics.note: We do not collect or store any personal information. All data collection is strictly limited to game-related information that helps us improve the gaming experience.

dataUse.title: Use of Game Data
dataUse.intro: The anonymous game data we collect is only used to:
items: Improve game performance and fix technical issues
dataUse.note: We never collect, sell, or share any personal information. Our focus is solely on improving the gaming experience through anonymous gameplay data.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: Our games use the following services for game analytics:
thirdParty.note: These services only process game-related data. For more information about their data practices, please refer to their respective privacy policies.

dataRetention.title: Data Management
dataRetention.content: Since we don't collect any personal data on our website, there is no personal information to manage. For game-related data:
options: If you have specific concerns about game data, you can contact us through our contact form below.
For data handled by our game platforms:
thirdPartyOptions: Unity Analytics: Refer to Unity's privacy policy
Steam: Refer to Steam's privacy policy
dataRetention.note: Remember that we only collect anonymous game data that cannot be linked to individual players.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our website does not collect any personal information, including from children. Our games are designed for general audiences and only collect anonymous gameplay data.
children.note: We encourage parents to review our game platforms' privacy policies if they have specific concerns about their children's gaming activities.

security.title: Security
security.content: Since our website doesn't collect any personal data, there are no privacy risks associated with browsing our site. For our games, we only collect anonymous gameplay data, which cannot be used to identify individual players.
security.note: Our focus is on maintaining the security of gameplay data while ensuring complete privacy for our players.

changes.title: Policy Updates
changes.content: If we make any changes to our data collection practices or this privacy policy, we will update this page accordingly. Any changes will only apply to our games' data collection practices, as our website remains free of any data collection.
changes.note: We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about our privacy practices.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy practices or our games' data collection, please use our contact form below.
contact.conclusion: Thank you for your interest in Angry Wisp! We are committed to maintaining your privacy while providing excellent gaming experiences. Our website collects no personal data, and our games only collect anonymous gameplay information to improve your gaming experience.
